title: More efficient logic needed for disk sorting with border values
description: The current logic for processing disk sorting when there is a border value for the row is not efficient. Copying the file to the destination folder can be improved by implementing a better logic. It is suggested to sort the data directly in memory and then write it to the file for better performance.
OB: The current logic for processing disk sorting with border values is not efficient.
EB: Implement a more efficient logic for processing disk sorting when there is a border value for the row. Sort the data directly in memory and then write it to the file.
SR: Improve the logic for disk sorting when there is a border value by implementing direct sorting in memory and writing the sorted data to the file.
